Reviews.Title: Beware of knock off OEM
Reviews.Author: Gary Lee
Reviews.Content: I don't like being negative but I was greatly disappointed with this one. First you could tell it had been painted and the LCD cover was re-glued on with grade school glue. The track ball did not even work and was defective as in the ball seem to be very small in the housing, and it also had nicks in the housing. The back battery cover was painted by air brush or some other method because you could see the color had a dripping look like the paint had ran during this process. Just the quality of the plastic from the molding stage you could tell it was not OEM. Very low quality over all. The seller did attempt to resolve the matter but was more worried about shipping and his product than customer service or satisfaction. The only resolution made was them replacing the front housing which the replacement was defective also. I purchased another one from another seller.

Reviews.Title: wrong one.....
Reviews.Author: S. W. Perry
Reviews.Content: received a t mobile case with out the lens cover and they said they did not have any more and it was removed from amazon??? it is still up and still for sale.

Reviews.Title: Not exactly as expected cannot recommend
Reviews.Author: T. Hahn "Gadget"
Reviews.Content: I usually don't leave reviews for products but I think this one does require some information.First of all I should have known something was up when I noticed that titanium was spelled wrong in the description ,hey everybody has a bad day at the keyboard every now and then, but that wasn't the only issue. While the product does work and does fit my phone it took a long time to get and when I opened the package and started looking over the product a few things made me wonder. Some of the case parts are quite obviously used you can see where screws had previously been tightened down onto the plastic and the small clip case part that goes on the bottom of the phone actually had T Mobile printed on it. It would almost seem that this company is recycling parts and while I'm all for recycling I also think that that should be noted in the description and I don't think it was mentioned anywhere in fact I'm pretty sure it says the product is supposed to be all new. But in spite of all this the product does fit and does work so in the end I suppose thats all that really matters just be aware that you will in all probability get some used parts in this kit and if thats ok by you then go for it.

Reviews.Title: Will make your phone look like new, but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Joel F. Hepola
Reviews.Content: This will make your phone look like new, but the frame part looks like it lacks the battery contacts, and in at least the case for my 8320, it appeared that the circuits on the frame part were different (I think it was a lack of the Wi-fi antenna), but otherwise beyond the fact that you need a T5 and T6 star take your phone apart, for the money it's a decent deal.

Reviews.Title: mala entrega
Reviews.Author: leonardo colonna
Reviews.Content: compre  2 articulos y me llegar uno solo el otro no me lo mandaron

Reviews.Title: Very bad quality
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: It's not OEM at all, and my 8320 didn't charge in since I replaced the new backplate, I had to use my old one then it's fine, besides, the trackball keypad is more flat than the original one. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: Patrick Murray
Reviews.Content: this housing was no good ...it couldn't even fit the phone at all... waste of money by far...cant believe they sold it that way

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: george
Reviews.Content: it made my phone look cool and nice but some letters and #s were so stiff i cound't dial or text without swearing

Reviews.Title: MUST READ
Reviews.Author: IMPORTANT
Reviews.Content: THIS NASTY PEOPLE, LIED TO ME, THEN THEY SENT THE WRON ITEM, I RETURNED BACK AND THEY KEEP ME WAITING FOR MY REFOUND FOR MORE THAN TWO WEEKS

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Yanira Parra
Reviews.Content: is of excellent quality, it has a great price, exactly what I expected, I recommend it, do not repent, excellent relation price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Kevon Serrant
Reviews.Content: PERFECT... All parts was easily installed an had a good grip in your hand. Colour was nice and very attractive.

Reviews.Title: housing for Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: Terry Spray
Reviews.Content: It has everything you need except the T5 and T6 torque drivers.  Worked great!

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Will S.
Reviews.Content: This was the best thing that I bought yet for my blackberry curve 8310 and I bought alot of extras for it. I will tell you for this price you can't beat it if you are looking to make your phone look different or just new again. This product made my blackberry look like it did when I opened the box for the first time. This product is well worth the money and very easy to install long as you have the right tools (torx 5,6 and a small pry tool) it took me about 10 minutes all together to disasemble and put it all back together. I'm so happy that I bought this now it should make my phone last another year or two without having to buy a whole new phone.

Reviews.Title: cell phone case
Reviews.Author: Denny
Reviews.Content: The case fit the phone perfectly makes it look brand new.  My phone a quit so I put it on my sisters phone so I don't know how it is functioning but last I talked to her all was well.

Reviews.Title: Got a brand new bberry
Reviews.Author: sandra amaya
Reviews.Content: It works great. My bberry looks brand new. I took it to the att store and they fixed it for me.

Reviews.Title: Wow!  5 year old phone looks and feels like new!
Reviews.Author: whatnot
Reviews.Content: Perfect OEM replacement for my tired old blackberry housing!  After opening my old blackberry case the numbers and letters of the keypad all came tumbling out like loose teeth on a 2 year old.  I found all kinds of dust, my dog's hair(??!!!) and other goodies inside the case.  Replacement was a fairly quick and simple procedure and now my blackberry looks and feels like it's brand new out of the box!!!  No more annoying dust between the lens and the lcd screen and typing feels great with the new keypad.  AWESOME!

Reviews.Title: Fair Enough
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: It was just a bit bigger than my 8310 board. The screen cover for some reason did not want to stay down even with the glue provided. I had to buy a separate one. Overall is passable

Reviews.Title: Brand new BB
Reviews.Author: Alexander E. Santana Mora "alexsant"
Reviews.Content: If you want to have a new Blackberry fast and easy this item is for you. Just with a few turns of a screwdriver and a couple of minutes you will have a brand new looking BB.On the other hand, this is an item with a lot of small pieces of plastic that can be broken really easily. Mine came with one of the little side anchors broken and the finished was not 100% right as I wanted to be. I suggest the seller to be more careful before sending an item without a proper checking and ensure that the packaging is the proper one for such a delicate piece o equipment.

Reviews.Title: An easy way to have a brand new looking blackberry
Reviews.Author: HPaul "hpshark"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product so I could repair my brand new Blackberry curve 8320, which accidently I dropped scratching the case pretty badly.  All the pieces are 100% from Blackberry, and are really easy to replace.  Your Curve 8320 will look like new again.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement to make your phone brand new
Reviews.Author: Kevin Packer "Bike nut"
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product! I am 100% satisfied with this cover. It even came with the tools to remove and replace the face plate. Everything worked perfect except the trackball so I had to use the old one but my phone looks and acts brand new now! I will purchase from this company again!

Reviews.Title: is exactly for att phones
Reviews.Author: Amilcar Orlando Calderon
Reviews.Content: is a great product, my phone look like new whin this case, I am recomend

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Jason Mcnabb "J"
Reviews.Content: Great product, works great easy to install, and has a good fit, the reason that i gave the review a 4 is the pictures of the product show 2 tools that are included, but the description of the product does not list the tools, well naturaly i assumed that the tool was included, so ither the photos are wrong or the tools werent shipped..... but the product its self is a great product my phone looks brand new and the sound quality of the new speakers is crystal clear as well

Reviews.Title: Wonder Purchase
Reviews.Author: Eddy Barrios
Reviews.Content: Weel protected to be shipped for that reason received in a vey well condition, more than I expected this is a really complete Kit, just with a litle compliant becouse a requested AT&T; logo and I received T-Mobile logo, but this does not matter compared with the great product I received, highly recommended.

ProductInfo.Features:
Replaces all parts on your phone cover
Keeps your phone looking new
Does not include t5 tool to remove old housing
ProductInfo.Name: Titanium AT&T GSM Original OEM Full Complete Case Housing for Rim BlackBerry Curve 8300 8310 8320 Cover Faceplate with Lens Trackball Keypads
